Title: The Shawshank Redemption
comment: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

Title: The Godfather
comment: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

Title: The Godfather: Part II
comment: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.

Title: The Dark Knight
comment: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests of his ability to fight injustice.

Title: 12 Angry Men
comment: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.

Title: Schindler's List
comment: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist

Title: Pulp Fiction
comment: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
comment: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

Title: Il buono, il brutto, il cattivo
comment: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.

Title: Forrest Gump
comment: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.

comment: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

comment: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soapmaker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

Title: Inception
comment: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a C.E.O.

Title: Dag II
comment: In a desolate war zone where screams of the innocent echo, seven Maroon Berets will dance with death on the very line between disaster and valor.

Title: Dil Bechara
comment: The emotional journey of two hopelessly in love youngsters, a young girl, Kizie, suffering from cancer, and a boy, Manny, whom she meets at a support group.

Title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest
comment: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

Title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
comment: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader and a bounty hunter named Boba Fett all over the galaxy.

Title: Goodfellas
comment: The story of

Title: The Matrix
comment: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
comment: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

Title: It's a Wonderful Life
comment: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.

Title: Shichinin no samurai
comment: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

Title: Star Wars
comment: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

Title: The Silence of the Lambs
comment: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

Title: Se7en
comment: Two detectives, a rookie and a veteran, hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.

Title: La vita ï¿½ï¿½ b
comment: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor, and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

Title: The Green Mile
comment: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.

Title: Saving Private Ryan
comment: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

comment: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits, and where humans are changed into beasts.

comment: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.

comment: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

comment: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.

comment: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.

Title: Modern Times
comment: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.

Title: Casablanca
comment: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not he should help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape French Morocco.

Title: Psycho
comment: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

Title: C'era una volta il West
comment: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

comment: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

comment: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

Title: Nuovo Cinema Paradiso
comment: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

Title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
comment: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

Title: The Lion King
comment: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

Title: The Usual Suspects
comment: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.

comment: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

Title: Gladiator
comment: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

Title: The Pianist
comment: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.

Title: The Departed
comment: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

Title: The Prestige
comment: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

Title: Intouchables
comment: After he becomes a quadriplegic from a paragliding accident, an aristocrat hires a young man from the projects to be his caregiver.

Title: Whiplash
comment: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory where his dreams of greatness are mentored by an instructor who will stop at nothing to realize a student's potential.

Title: Joker
comment: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck is disregarded and mistreated by society. He then embarks on a downward spiral of revolution and bloody crime. This path brings him face-to-face with his alter-ego: the Joker.

Title: The Great Dictator
comment: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.

Title: Sunset Blvd.
comment: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.

Title: Rear Window
comment: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.

Title: Paths of Glory
comment: After refusing to attack an enemy position, a general accuses the soldiers of cowardice and their commanding officer must defend them.

Title: Witness for the Prosecution
comment: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

Title: Dr. Strangelove or: How I Learned to Stop Worrying and Love the Bomb
comment: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.

Title: Alien
comment: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

Title: Apocalypse Now
comment: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.

Title: The Shining
comment: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

Title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
comment: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before

Title: Once Upon a Time in America
comment: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

Title: Mononoke-hime
comment: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

Title: Memento
comment: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

Title: Oldeuboi
comment: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

Title: Das Leben der Anderen
comment: In 1984 East Berlin, an agent of the secret police, conducting surveillance on a writer and his lover, finds himself becoming increasingly absorbed by their lives.

Title: WALLï¿½
comment: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

Title: Taare Zameen Par
comment: An eight-year-old boy is thought to be a lazy trouble-maker, until the new art teacher has the patience and compassion to discover the real problem behind his struggles in school.

Title: 3 Idiots
comment: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

Title: The Dark Knight Rises
comment: Eight years after the Joker's reign of anarchy, Batman, with the help of the enigmatic Catwoman, is forced from his exile to save Gotham City from the brutal guerrilla terrorist Bane.

Title: Django Unchained
comment: With the help of a German bounty hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal Mississippi plantation owner.

Title: Coco
comment: Aspiring musician Miguel, confronted with his family's ancestral ban on music, enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

Title: Avengers: Infinity War
comment: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation and ruin puts an end to the universe.

Title: Avengers: Endgame
comment: After the devastating events of

Title: Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse
comment: Teen Miles Morales becomes the Spider-Man of his universe, and must join with five spider-powered individuals from other dimensions to stop a threat for all realities.

Title: Dangal
comment: Former wrestler

Title: Kimi no na wa.
comment: Two strangers find themselves linked in a bizarre way. When a connection forms, will distance be the only thing to keep them apart?

Title: Capharnaï¿½
comment: While serving a five-year sentence for a violent crime, a 12-year-old boy sues his parents for neglect.

Title: The Kid
comment: The Tramp cares for an abandoned child, but events put that relationship in jeopardy.

Title: Metropolis
comment: In a futuristic city sharply divided between the working class and the city planners, the son of the city's mastermind falls in love with a working class prophet who predicts the coming of a savior to mediate their differences.

Title: M - Eine Stadt sucht einen Mï¿½ï¿½
comment: When the police in a German city are unable to catch a child-murderer, other criminals join in the manhunt.

Title: Citizen Kane
comment: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

Title: Double Indemnity
comment: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.

Title: Ladri di biciclette
comment: In post-war Italy, a working-class man's bicycle is stolen. He and his son set out to find it.

Title: Ikiru
comment: A bureaucrat tries to find a meaning in his life after he discovers he has terminal cancer.

Title: Singin' in the Rain
comment: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.

Title: Vertigo
comment: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.

Title: North by Northwest
comment: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.

Title: The Apartment
comment: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.

Title: Lawrence of Arabia
comment: The story of

Title: Per qualche dollaro in piï¿
comment: Two bounty hunters with the same intentions team up to track down a Western outlaw.

Title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
comment: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

Title: A Clockwork Orange
comment: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.

Title: The Sting
comment: Two grifters team up to pull off the ultimate con.

Title: Taxi Driver
comment: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.

Title: Das Boot
comment: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

Title: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi
comment: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

Title: Scarface
comment: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.
